note:
Armchair futurist. Good at trivia. Worried about the country and the world. Trying to stay positive

Core beliefs:
I don’t care who marries who if both people are adults
I don’t care what religion you are if you aren’t hurting other people and you leave me alone
I think healthcare is a right and at minimum it should be unbound from employment
Skyline chili is an abomination
There is a special place in hell (the one I don’t believe in) for people that talk in the movie theater
Bow ties are cool
